The targeted framework version (2.0, 3.0, 3.5, 4.0, ….).

span.span: The targeted minimum and maximum OS versions in the registry.

span.span: These values are used to return only directories for OS versions between the declared minimum and maximum.

param.span: 如果该值为空或为 NULL，则不进行筛选。

span.span: If this value is blank or null, no filtering is done.

span.span: This determines which registry hives are searched and in which order.

summary.span: 获取 对象的已排序列表，这些对象包含第三方程序集注册所在目录的相关信息。

span.span: Gets a sorted list of objects which contain information about the directories in which the third party assemblies are registered.

summary.span: 此信息在生成中使用和设计时使用。

span.span: This information is used at build and design time.

returns.span: 返回 的列表。

span.span: Returns list of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法枚举`AssemblyFoldersEx`注册表位置，并返回的列表`AssemblyFoldersExInfo`顺序它们在设计的引用程序集来搜索和生成时间。This method enumerates the `AssemblyFoldersEx` registry location and returns the list of `AssemblyFoldersExInfo` in the same order that they are searched for reference assemblies at design and build time. 64 位操作系统上，如果面向 64 位，添加在 64 位 hive 然后 32 位 hive 中;如果目标 32 位，，添加在 32 位 hive 然后的 64 位配置单元。On a 64-bit operating system, if targeting 64-bit, add in the 64-bit hive then the 32-bit hive; if targeting 32-bit, add in the 32-bit hive then the 64-bit hive. 在仅 32 位计算机上的 32 位配置单元中添加。On 32-bit machine only add in the 32-bit hive.

summary.span: 获取系统目录的完全限定路径。

span.span: Gets the fully qualified path of the system directory.

value.span: 包含指向系统目录的目录路径的字符串。

span.span: A string containing a directory path to the system directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的一个示例是值的"C:\WinNT\System32"的字符串。An example of the value returned is the string "C:\WinNT\System32".
